content.question: The presence of media hubs, coalitions focusing on specific environmental challenges, and headquarters for multinational corporations in major cities help explain how such cities

choices.label: avoid participation in global processes and decision making
are linked globally in ways that transcend national political boundaries
are isolated and dependent on national political boundaries for security
preserve cultural heritage and contribute to increasing isolation
generate individual wealth and drive economic development within cities boundaries

content.answer: are linked globally in ways that transcend national political boundaries
